reviewText: This DVD was just the same old, same old. I was a bit disappointed! My bad, should have done some more research before I purchased it.

I watched it and through most of it, It was ok, but I ended up bored. To each is his own taste.. I suggest you check it out yourself and decide what you think. I can be hard to please. I am a movie fanatic from the word go.

I got this video because I was looking for an instructional video that would give step-by-step instructions how to do oral and anal sex between men.  This is much more like a sex education video for high-schoolers.  It gives general advice on dating, sex, and relationships.  It talks about safe sex a lot.  It doesn't give step-by-step instructions.  It shows some masturbation and oral sex, but not much, and it doesn't explain how to do it.

Also, the video is dated.  Some of the sex information about STD prevention I expect is outdated.
if you are coming out and need to know more or whant to know more this is a good thing for you
